name: Fidel Castro
office: First Secretary of the Communist Party of Cuba
president3: Manuel Urrutia Lleó, Osvaldo Dorticós Torrado
office4: 7th and 23rd Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement
spouse: Mirta Diaz-Balart  (1948–1955) , Dalia Soto del Valle  (1980–present)
children: Fidel Ángel Castro Diaz-Balart, Alina Fernandez-Revuelta, Alexis Castro-Soto, Alejandro Castro-Soto, Antonio Castro-Soto, Angel Castro-Soto, Alain Castro-Soto, Jorge Angel Castro, Francisca Pupo
footnote: Acting presidential powers were transferred to Raúl Castro from July 31, 2006.
